basics.name: ERIK ABRAHAMSON
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I've been casually writing code for quite sometime. I recently enrolled in a Full Stack immersive program at Galvanize to jumpstart my career and expertise in the world of software development. I'm a problem solver at heart - coming from a background in philosophy and clinical psychology. I am a technological optimist and believe that the web serves as a paramount tool for economic and social advancement.

highlights: Worked within creative, operations, marketing, and development teams in an Agile project management setting to administer product life cycle
Managed over fifty portfolio websites overseeing development tasks and various marketing initiatives
Directed training webinars for proprietary CMS for clients and fulfilled client requests on a daily basis
Developed and styled numerous websites with mobile-first, responsive designs
Created monthly corporate roll-up analytic reports containing trends in comprehensive Google Analytics, social media, and email user database metrics

work.summary: Design assets for label printing company
highlights: Digital content management for World Label division; LabelsOnTime.com
Created and managed images for individual product pages to strengthen search engine optimization and UX design
Edited and co-wrote press release, info, and technical specification page for website launch
Created and maintained Google Merchant & AdWords data feed for website

work.summary: Full time assistant therapist for group therapy
highlights: Assistant for ten individual group therapy sessions that specialize in adolescent and post-adolescent males
Worked with variety of patients who are predominantly, but not limited to the autistic spectrum
Responsible for leading discussions and exercises, and creating springboard discussion topics
Promoted patient psychological well-being by employing play, talk, discussion, introspective, and behavioral therapies
Assisted organizing annual workshops for audiences over seventy people, including Q&A and discussion with audience
Assisted in strategy and proposal development for small businesses seeking online marketing
Liaison between creative team and clients
Specialized in website design and development, search engine optimization, social media marketing, and brand development
Employed tools such as Google Analytics, Wordpress, Facebook, Twitter, Salesforce, Microsoft Office, and the Adobe Creative Suite
Assisted in wireframe development for proposed websites

work.summary: Freelance IT consulting and wordpress development
highlights: Online database management for industrial complex properties for rent
Assisted with various Windows-based software and hardware related tasks, as well as some marketing and advertising tasks
Developed and created website and content using Wordpress for new business venture

courses: Gain hands-on experience working with and building applications with RESTful APIs using the MEAN stack
Core focus on JavaScript, AngularJS and Node.js
Build comprehensive understanding of Object-Oriented Programming, Test-Driven Development, and Behavior-Driven Development
Design, develop and test numerous projects, both self-directed and team-directed

references.name: Janir Thorndike
references.reference: I managed Erik directly and found him to be a motivated employee and effective communicator. Erik brought an overall positive attitude each day and was at his best when given a problem to solve. I enjoyed working with Erik and believe he will make a positive contribution to the next team he joins.

references.name: Aaron Lovato
references.reference: Erik was employed at PlaceWise Media as an Account Coordinator. He has been an excellent addition to our staff, often times wearing many hats on the account team and development team. During his time here he has shown himself to be a diligent worker and always willing to give his best efforts at all assignments given to him. He learns new tasks quickly with minimal instruction. I have no doubt that Erik will quickly pick up whatever skills will be required in his next job, as he has with this one, and that he will be a great asset to his next employer. His pleasant personality will be missed.
